title: Abruptum Evil Genius Flac
description:
Originally released in 1995, &#039;Evil Genius&#039; compiles Abruptum&#039;s earliest recordings, the 1990 demos &#039;Hexum Galaem Zelog&#039; and &#039;The Satanist Tunes&#039;. Dubbed by the late Euronymus as "the essence of pure black evil", Abruptum is only for those searching out the darkest and bleakest expressions of human emotion. All others: stay well away


This is my first torrent so please excuse any incompetence on my part.  I tried 
EAC but couldn&#039;t get it to flac, so I just just used the Free CD Music Converter set to Level 8 FLAC.  There is no log, but It is Ripped to flac from a fresh store-bought CD.  If you like it check out Southern Lord Records for great (but not free) doom and black metal.

I have a crappy 1.5 mbs connection so it will take a while to get going.

Please dont let this torrent die.  It sucks when UG Metal goes to waste.
